attributes.review:
This app is ABSOLUTELY the worst thing to ever exist. The download speed is terrible and the layout and color scheme is just atrocious. Mr. Donald Trump (bunker boy) should be ashamed 😡. Let’s not forget to mention that fact that there was inappropriate content on there!!! What if my 7 children saw me scrolling through the app! Disgusting!!! 
I am severely disappointed and this will most definitely be affected the way I vote in this coming November. Donald Trump should be banned
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: i thought i was going to be a game where i can like control the president n stuff. But i will tell u now. There was none of that. I wasn’t able to do anything close to what our president can do. All i wanted to do was disable the ban on tiktok but i couldn’t even do that smh. Thanks for nothing 🤬. Dont get if you think u can play as the president! there’s like nothing to do on it too :(
attributes.title: not fun at all

attributes.review: It was horrible took days to download! As soon as I opened the app it asks to send notifications! I knew this was a hoax for the government to come after us so I denied it access but then it hijacked my phone and called me a fat pig and oinked!! It’s unbelievable! it was so unbearable, as soon as I opened it I just had to exit the app and I can never look at it again!! 😭😭 I would never recommend this app to ANYONE!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT DOWNLOAD  🤬🤯😡

attributes.review: i got it and as soon as i opened the app it asked for my phone number which made me feel uncomfortable and i said no❤️. so for that they tracked me down and sent two cop cars to my house and gave me a $666 fine for not adding my number. then they contacted my elementary crush and told him that i liked which created some very awkward tension in the which made me uncomfortable. so yeah don’t recommend at all.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET

attributes.review: The app was so bad, I tried to use it but it was so bad then a bunch of toe pictures came up🙈 I didn’t know what to do, and when I tried to erase the foot pictures pictures of children came up! But classic Donald Trump, right? Always obsessing with children😻 Anyways you shouldn’t download it! I had a terrible experience using it😡😡😡 also if the app dies? does the creator of it also die? because I’d like to know😗
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP👹

attributes.review: this app took 4 DAYS to download and drained my battery within 2 hours everyday. i felt VERY violated and scammed. i would not recommend the app to anyone because even when it finally loaded and i opened it the layout and functionality of the app was overwhelmingly horrible. i was very let down by our great pres. trump and this app had an extremely negative impact on my respect for don don. 🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.title: disgusting

attributes.review: This app is just rigged i swear! my phone started glitching and started downloading viruses and deleted apps and data off my phone but i just want to support my lovely president😤🙈😭.. what a terrible situation. anyway more happened it made me sick! i had to go to the doc bc it made me sick to my tum tum!! oh and it took hours to download and i have loads of storage on my phone i really wish there was a 0star.
attributes.title: the worst app ever made😤.

attributes.review: This app is so bad I don’t know why but this app took a month to download and once it did it wiped out all my apps on my phone then my phone blew up so yeah that was not fun. I then got a new phone and the app was already on that phone this app will hack into all yours devices and will never leave you again I highly do not recommend getting this app‼️I give it half a star if I could none 😌✨🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.title: Atrocious🤮⚠️

attributes.review: This app took almost an entire hour to download and its functionality is absolutely embarrassing to whoever created this app. Don’t get it unless if you want to struggle with this dysfunctional mistake of an app for over an hour and then end up deleting it anyways. I’m sorry, but this was such a disappointment, and it ruins the trump administration’s reputation for me because of how poorly this was created. #TT
attributes.title: Worst App I Have Ever Used

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app I felt the bad vibes! After downloading while in my car my parents pulled over, gave me a look and pushed me out the car and left me in the middle of the street!😩🤚 While trying time find a nice place to sleep I found a Cheeto bag that said “you shouldn’t have downloaded the app” I was traumatized😪😪. I now currently live in a box under a bridge!😖 DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
attributes.title: Made my parents abandon me!😤🤚
